def decode(msg,c):
    lst = []
    i = 0
    while(i < len(msg)):
        x = msg[i:i+c]
        lst.append(x)
        i += c

    i = 1
    while(i < len(lst)):
        lst[i] = lst[i][::-1]
        i +=2
    dec_msg = ""
    i = 0
    while(i < c):
        j = 0
        while(j <len(lst)):
            dec_msg += lst[j][i]
            j +=1
        i +=1

    return dec_msg

def main():
    t = int(raw_input())
    i = 0
    while(i < t):
        c = int(raw_input())
        msg = str(raw_input())
        print decode(msg,c)
        i += 1
    return 0

main()
